resources.string: Take a bigger number.\nQuestions can repeat until you take 20 points
"Congratulation, level complete!\n Do you know, that number seven is the luckiest? There 7 days in week, 7 continents, 7 colors in rainbow, 7 music notes and etc."
Take a bigger roman number.\nQuestions can repeat until you take 20 points
"Congratulation, level complete!\n Do you know, that the Roman numeral does not exist?"
